plugins.name: Mode Match
plugins.description:
Mode Match lets you take a variable's value from one mode and apply it to other modes. Match a single variable, group of variables, or all variables in a collection!


  1. Select your multi-mode collection
  2. Select the source mode (copy from)
  3. Select the destination mode (copy to)
  4. Enter the path to a group of variables or a single variable (see below for bulk actions)
  5. Update ✨


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Bulk Actions

You will most likely want to run this on a group or the entire collection:

  1. Update all variables within a group by entering a path/to/group
  2. Update all variables in the collection by entering / @all or @root in the path input


Plugin Notes

  1. Collection list will only show collections with more than 1 mode
  2. Variable names and paths are case sensitive
  3. Updating variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate


Supports

  1. All variable types (number, string, boolean, color)
  2. Aliasing
  3. Raw values


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Match variable values across modes.

131968.name: Mode Match
131968.description:

plugins.name: MoveQuack
plugins.description:
Feature Overview

This plugin allows users to set customizable timers for both work and break periods, catering to individual needs.


Key Features

Customizable Timer: Set specific times for work and rest, with full flexibility.

Timed Reminders: Automatically alerts users when it's time to take a break, preventing overwork.

Boost Efficiency and Health: Helps maintain high productivity while ensuring overall well-being.


Use Cases

Perfect for users who engage in long work or study sessions, especially for professionals like designers and developers who need regular breaks.
plugins.tagline: Break Reminder Timer

plugins.name: Synchronize Frames
plugins.description:
This program enhances efficiency in Figma by allowing users to synchronize frames automatically. It ensures that any modifications made to a selected frame are instantly reflected in all corresponding frames, promoting consistency across designs. The user interface features intuitive buttons to assign frames, toggle synchronization, and activate auto-sync capabilities.


To automatically search for frames for synchronization, the "SS_" tag must be specified before the frame name.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly synchronize your design frames for a more efficient workflow

113339.name: Synchronize Frames
113339.description:
This program enhances efficiency in Figma by allowing users to synchronize frames automatically. It ensures that any modifications made to a selected frame are instantly reflected in all corresponding frames, promoting consistency across designs. The user interface features intuitive buttons to assign frames, toggle synchronization, and activate auto-sync capabilities.


To automatically search for frames for synchronization, the "SS_" tag must be specified before the frame name.
113339.tagline: Seamlessly synchronize your design frames for a more efficient workflow

plugins.name: snapInsert
plugins.description:
snapInsert is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline the process of searching filtering and adding component instances into your designs.

Perfect for designers and teams who work with large design systems, Component Filter helps you save time and maintain focus on your design tasks.


Key Features:

• Component Set Filtering: Easily filter components by their set names to focus on specific groups within your design system.

• Dynamic Key-Value Filtering: Use key-value pairs to narrow down your search and find exactly what you need based on component properties like size, orientation, or any custom attributes.

• Real-Time Results: As you apply filters, see immediate updates to the component list, ensuring you always have the most relevant components in view.

• Intuitive UI: The plugin features a clean, user-friendly interface that integrates seamlessly with Figma, making it easy to apply filters and manage your components.


Note:

Currently, Component Filter only searches for components within the file you are working on. In future releases, users will be able to search components from published design libraries, expanding the plugin's functionality to cover broader design systems.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly search and insert component instances from sets or singles into your designs.

plugins.name: Responsive Font-Size Generator (CSS clamp)
plugins.description:
Generate perfect CSS clamp() values for responsive typography in seconds


Transform your Figma text elements into production-ready responsive CSS with intelligent clamp() value generation. Select any text element and get perfectly scaled typography that works beautifully across all devices.


✨ Key Features

  1. Smart Typography Scaling: Mobile-first approach with 75-80% reduction for optimal readability
  2. Intelligent Variable Naming: Automatically suggests semantic CSS variable names (--h1-base, --h2-base, etc.)
  3. One-Click Workflow: Select text → Copy clamp value → Paste into CSS
  4. Container Query Ready: Uses modern cqw units for fluid responsive design
  5. Clean Output: Production-ready CSS with no unnecessary trailing zeros


🎨 Example Output

--h1-base: clamp(1.88rem, 4.2cqw, 2.5rem);
--h2-base: clamp(1.5rem, 4.2cqw, 2rem);
--text-xl: clamp(1rem, 2.2cqw, 1.25rem);

No more manual calculations or responsive typography headaches – just perfect clamp values, every time.


🔗 Also check out our Figma to Oxygen Builder Plugin for complete design-to-WordPress conversion!


wpconverters.com
plugins.tagline: Get perfect responsive Font-Size properties

plugins.name: FrameFlex - Frame Resizer & Scaler
plugins.description:
🔹 FrameFlex – Smart Frame Resizing for Figma 🎯

Manually resizing frames can be a nightmare — especially when things break.

FrameFlex is a Figma plugin built to help you intelligently scale mobile frames, while preserving structure and layout integrity (when properly set up). ✨


Here’s what FrameFlex can do:


🔁 Multi-frame support – Resize multiple mobile frames in one action.

📱 Device presets – Quickly apply popular mobile screen sizes like iPhone, Android, and more.

📐 Layout-aware resizing – Maintains Auto Layout, constraints, and alignment — if your design is structured correctly.

🔤 Element scaling – Adjusts font size, spacing, strokes, and other properties proportionally.

🎯 Icon/vector protection – Prevents scaling on specific elements to avoid distortion.

⚙️ Rounding controls – Use smart, grid, or exact rounding for clean results.


💡 The more Auto Layout you use, the better the results will be.

FrameFlex works best when your design is clean, consistent, and fully built with Auto Layout in mind.


✅ Focused on mobile-first workflows.

⚠️ Support for other frame types depends on how well they're structured.
plugins.tagline: Resize multiple frames. Preserve structure. Stay consistent.

137642.name: FrameFlex - Frame Resizer & Scaler
137642.description:

Here’s what FrameFlex can do:

📱 Device presets – Quickly apply popular mobile screen sizes like iPhone, Android, and more.

📐 Layout-aware resizing – Maintains Auto Layout, constraints, and alignment — if your design is structured correctly.

🔤 Element scaling – Adjusts font size, spacing, strokes, and other properties proportionally.

🎯 Icon/vector protection – Prevents scaling on specific elements to avoid distortion.

⚙️ Rounding controls – Use smart, grid, or exact rounding for clean results.


💡 The more Auto Layout you use, the better the results will be.

FrameFlex works best when your design is clean, consistent, and fully built with Auto Layout in mind.


✅ Focused on mobile-first workflows.

⚠️ Support for other frame types depends on how well they're structured.
137642.tagline: Resize multiple frames. Preserve structure. Stay consistent.

plugins.name: TokenBoard
plugins.description:
TokenBoard is an advanced Figma plugin designed to give you full visibility and control over local variable collections — whether you’re building a robust design system, managing light/dark modes, or maintaining consistent styles across teams.


Features Overview


Explore Variables by Collection, Scope & Mode

  1. Browse all local variable collections in your Figma file
  2. Organized as expandable tree structures by collection, group, and nested groups
  3. View and compare values across all modes (e.g. “Light”, “Dark”)


Smart Search

  1. Instant full-text search across variable names, values, types, and scopes
  2. Highlights matches inside nested groups
  3. Keeps scroll position and selection while typing


Visual & Semantic Display

  1. Color tokens show live swatches, hex values, and opacity
  2. Boolean, number, string tokens are clearly labeled
  3. Aliases display as links to target variables with inline previews


Aliases & References

  1. Displays alias chains with resolved values
  2. Clickable interface to explore alias references
  3. Supports setting or detaching aliases via selector popup


Inline Editing of Values

  1. Edit most values directly inside the table: Colors (rgba), Strings, Numbers, Booleans, Aliases
  2. Shows validation states and editable highlights
  3. Supports editing multiple modes in a variable


Selection-Aware Variable Inspector

  1. Automatically detects all variables applied to the selected node(s) on the canvas
  2. Displays them grouped by collection, scope, and mode
  3. Resolves and highlights any aliases used
  4. Handles nested selections and multiple nodes
  5. Edit Values Directly from the Selection
  6. Selection-based variable data is cached with a unique key
  7. Improves performance when switching between nodes
  8. Cache is auto-expired after 5 minutes or can be manually refreshed


Batch Update

  1. Send a list of changes (e.g. 30+ variable updates) in one click
  2. Type conversion (color objects, strings, aliases)
  3. Font loading for FONT_FAMILY variables (with fallback to alternative styles if “Regular” not available)
  4. Scope checks and error recovery per variable
  5. Returns a report of successful and failed updates


Performance Optimizations

  1. In-memory caching of selection data with expiry (5 min)
  2. Caches up to 50 different selections to reduce API calls
  3. Tracks which variables are already loaded to avoid duplication


Figma API Compatibility Handling

  1. Graceful fallback if variable APIs or methods are unavailable
  2. Error messages guide user to fix or retry


Clean, Resizable UI

  1. Fully styled native-like UI with Figma theme support (light/dark)
  2. Flexible layout with resizable panel
  3. Displays progress during data load
  4. Empty states and error messages styled for clarity


Ideal Use Cases

  1. Design system audits
  2. Token cleanup and maintenance
  3. Visual QA of theme modes
  4. Alias linking and optimization
  5. Batch updates to variable values
  6. Color or typography token management


Compatibility

  1. Built for the latest Figma API with full variable support
  2. Works in Figma files only (not FigJam)
  3. Requires Variables feature enabled in your Figma workspace

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Advanced Figma plugin for browsing, editing, and batch-managing local variables, modes, and aliases

plugins.name: Gulugulu Effect - create Glass Effects in one click
plugins.description: Inspired by iOS 26 and modern glassmorphism trends, Gulugulu Effect lets you instantly apply a frosted glass look to any layer in Figma. It uses background blur, semi-transparent fills, and soft gradient strokes to recreate that polished, liquid-glass UI feel. No need to tweak settings manually. Just select, click, and vibe. Perfect for designers who want sleek, minimal, futuristic interfaces — fast.
plugins.tagline: Turn any shape into pure iOS-style liquid glass — in one click.

137206.tagline: Turn any shape into pure iOS-style liquid glass — in one click.

Perfect for design system maintainers, freelancers, and plugin nerds who want clean, linked, and scalable color usage.

plugins.name: colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer
plugins.description:
Zendeeps | colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer helps you understand the color distribution in your Figma frames. Select any frame, and the plugin shows:

•How many unique colors are used

•Which colors appear the most

•The percentage breakdown of each color


It scans fills, strokes, and effects to give you a quick overview of your color usage—perfect for design audits, cleanup, and maintaining consistency.


No setup required. Just open the plugin, click a frame, and see the stats.

accepted.name: Ruhul
accepted.description: Senior UX/UI Designer and Webflow Developer

plugins.tagline: Visualize your color usage at a glance.

plugins.name: Icon Scaler
plugins.description:
ICON SCALER :

This plugin lets you scale one or multiple selected icons into multiple standard sizes in a single click — while preserving all their styles, groups, layers, strokes, and fills. No flattening. No distortion.


But that’s not all — It also automatically generates a variable component for each icon, so you can easily manage different icon sizes using Figma's powerful component properties.


Whether you’re preparing icon sets for design systems, exports, or different platform needs, this plugin automates the repetitive work — and gives you perfect consistency every time.


KEY FEATURES:

✅ Scale multiple icons at once into multiple sizes

✅ Preserves structure — no flattening or vector merging

✅ Creates a variable component with size modes for each icon

✅ UI with smart “chip-style” size selection + custom size support

✅ Neatly arranged output inside a new frame, ready to use or export
plugins.tagline: Create Icon Size Range and components instantly

134540.name: Icon Scaler
134540.description:
ICON SCALER :

This plugin lets you scale one or multiple selected icons into multiple standard sizes in a single click — while preserving all their styles, groups, layers, strokes, and fills. No flattening. No distortion.


But that’s not all — It also automatically generates a variable component for each icon, so you can easily manage different icon sizes using Figma's powerful component properties.


Whether you’re preparing icon sets for design systems, exports, or different platform needs, this plugin automates the repetitive work — and gives you perfect consistency every time.


KEY FEATURES:

✅ Scale multiple icons at once into multiple sizes

✅ Preserves structure — no flattening or vector merging

✅ Creates a variable component with size modes for each icon

✅ UI with smart “chip-style” size selection + custom size support

✅ Neatly arranged output inside a new frame, ready to use or export
134540.tagline: Create Icon Size Range and components instantly

plugins.name: Thai Spell Checker - พ่อขุนเช็ก (AI Powered) - Beta
plugins.description:
🏰 พ่อขุนเช็ก - ตัวช่วยเช็กภาษาไทยสุดแม่น ที่ทำให้การทำงานง่าย สนุก และดูโปรฯ กว่าเดิม!


✨ จุดเด่นของพ่อขุนเช็ก

* เช็กภาษาไทยแม่นยำระดับโปร : ใช้ AI ตรวจสอบการสะกดและบริบทไทยแบบละเอียด ครบทุกจุด

* สรุปผลไว สนุก และเข้าใจง่าย : ระบบให้คะแนนพร้อมแนะนำแบบเข้าใจง่าย สนุก เหมือนมีพ่อขุนรามคำแหงมาคอยติวส่วนตัว

* ใช้งานง่ายในคลิกเดียว : เลือกเฟรม/ข้อความ แล้วคลิกเดียวจบ ไม่ต้องเสียเวลาย้ายแพลตฟอร์ม

* ประหยัดเวลาทำงานจริง : ไม่ต้องเช็กทีละคำ ตรวจจบในรอบเดียว พร้อมใช้งานทันที


🎯 เหมาะกับใคร

* UX Writer สาย Copy ไทย

* ทีม Marketing ที่สร้าง Content ไทย

* Designer/ทีม Product ที่ต้องการงานไทยไร้ที่ติใน Figma


🚀 เริ่มใช้งานง่ายสุด ๆ

1. เลือกข้อความที่ต้องการเช็ก

2. เปิด Plugin “Thai Spell Checker - พ่อขุนเช็ก (AI Powered)” ใน Figma

3. รับผลตรวจและคำแนะนำทันที! ทำให้การเช็กภาษาไทยไม่ใช่เรื่องน่าเบื่ออีกต่อไป


เพียงคลิกเดียว งานภาษาไทยของคุณจะไร้ที่ติ ดูมืออาชีพ และประหยัดเวลากว่าที่เคย!
plugins.tagline: เช็คการสะกดภาษาไทยด้วย AI แบบสนุกๆ สไตล์พ่อขุนรามคำแหง พร้อมให้คะแนนแบบโบราณ

plugins.name: SaveFrame - Save, Share, and Manage Custom Frames with Ease.
plugins.description:
SaveFrame — Figma Frames, Re imagined!


Tired of Figma’s default frame window? SaveFrame is your modern visual command center for everything frames.

Custom frames, Organize, preview, customize, delete, and share—like never before.


Whether you're documenting designs, building moodboards, or curating visual systems, SaveFrame gives you full creative control. It's what Figma frames should feel like.


✨ Why designers love SaveFrame:


🔍 Instant Frame Previews

  1. No more clicking around. See all your frames at a glance in a clean, scrollable UI.

🧩 Drag & Drop Organization

  1. Sort, group, and build collections effortlessly. Your canvas, your logic.

🧹 Smart Deletion

  1. Clear out what you don’t need—instantly. Delete single frames or full sets with confidence.

📐 Save All the Details

  1. Dimensions, effects, layout, constraints—SaveFrame remembers the stuff that matters.

🎨 Reusable Frame Presets

  1. Create your own frame styles and apply them in one click. Keep your design patterns consistent.

🚀 Seamless Sharing

  1. Export and import frame collections in seconds.
  2. Perfect for sharing with teammates or individuals—no friction, no confusion.

⭐ Favorite Key Frames

  1. Highlight your best work and access it instantly when it counts.

🌗 Light & Dark Mode

  1. A workspace that adapts to your vibe, day or night.



🛠 Built for designers who:

  1. Want more control than Figma gives out of the box
  2. Create and manage multiple frames daily
  3. Build moodboards, docs, and design systems
  4. Hate clutter and love visual clarity
  5. Need a fast way to share organized frames with collaborators


In short:

We took the idea of Figma frames and made it flexible, collaborative, and creator-first.

SaveFrame isn’t just a tool—it’s a better way to work with frames.
plugins.tagline: Figma Frames, Reimagined — Save, Share, and Manage Custom Frames with Ease.

plugins.name: Sustainalyzer
plugins.description:
Sustainalyzer helps you evaluate the ecological impact of your Figma designs. It detects design elements that conflict with the Web Sustainability Guidelines (WSG) and scientific research on digital sustainability.


The plugin checks for the following sustainability issues:


  1. Avoid videos, particularly autoplay or background media
  2. Minimize image use, especially large or excessive images
  3. Optimize images for size, format, and scaling
  4. Avoid third-party services (e.g. embeds, maps, social widgets)
  5. Avoid decorative elements that add visual weight without purpose
  6. Limit font variants to reduce font file size
  7. Prefer system fonts over custom fonts
  8. Reduce complexity by limiting the number of elements
  9. Disable animation autoplay to reduce processor load
  10. Consider older devices, avoiding effects that degrade performance or compatibility
  11. Use a design system to support reuse and reduce redundancy
  12. Choose energy-efficient colors, especially for large UI areas


Each guideline is tagged with an impact level—high, medium, or low—indicating its potential contribution to emissions. You can filter the results by impact level to focus on the most critical issues.


To use Sustainalyzer, simply select the elements you want to analyze and run the plugin.
plugins.tagline: Check your designs for sustainability issues based on the Web Sustainability Guidelines.

133118.description:

  2. Minimize image use, especially large or excessive images
  3. Optimize images for size, format, and scaling
  4. Avoid third-party services (e.g. embeds, maps, social widgets)
  5. Avoid decorative elements that add visual weight without purpose
  6. Limit font variants to reduce font file size
  7. Prefer system fonts over custom fonts
  8. Reduce complexity by limiting the number of elements
  9. Disable animation autoplay to reduce processor load
  10. Consider older devices, avoiding effects that degrade performance or compatibility
  11. Use a design system to support reuse and reduce redundancy
  12. Choose energy-efficient colors, especially for large UI areas


Each guideline is tagged with an impact level—high, medium, or low—indicating its potential contribution to emissions. You can filter the results by impact level to focus on the most critical issues.


To use Sustainalyzer, simply select the elements you want to analyze and run the plugin.
133118.release_notes:
- Removed Linear & Radial gradient from decorative elements check
- Minor bug fixes
133118.tagline: Check your designs for sustainability issues based on the Web Sustainability Guidelines.

plugins.name: Version Linker
plugins.description:
Version Linker - Link and Manage Component Versions


A powerful version management plugin for Figma that helps you link and track different versions of your components across frames.


Key Features:

• Create Main Version Links (MVL) to establish version control points

• Add Secondary Version Links (SVL) to connect related components

• Navigate instantly between linked components

• Add descriptions to track changes and updates

• Customize version colors for better visual organization

• Manage versions with easy-to-use edit and delete functions


Perfect for:

• Design systems with multiple component versions

• Teams tracking component evolution

• Projects requiring version history

• Maintaining component relationships across frames


How it works:

1. Create an MVL with a version number and color

2. Add SVLs to connect related components in different frames

3. Add descriptions to document changes

4. Use the navigation buttons to quickly move between linked components


Stay organized and maintain clear version relationships in your Figma files with Version Linker.
plugins.tagline: managing version

128349.name: Version Linker
128349.description:

• Navigate instantly between linked components

• Add descriptions to track changes and updates

• Customize version colors for better visual organization

• Manage versions with easy-to-use edit and delete functions


Perfect for:

• Design systems with multiple component versions

• Teams tracking component evolution

• Maintaining component relationships across frames


How it works:

1. Create an MVL with a version number and color

2. Add SVLs to connect related components in different frames

3. Add descriptions to document changes

4. Use the navigation buttons to quickly move between linked components


Stay organized and maintain clear version relationships in your Figma files with Version Linker.

plugins.name: Lehuye
plugins.description:
简介：

这款多功能插件专为设计师和开发者设计，旨在简化文本管理和矢量图形处理流程。通过提供一系列强大的文本操作功能，如一键提取、批量替换、精准筛选和灵活插入等，极大地提高了工作效率。此外，它还支持快速导出SVG代码及自动捕获当前窗口标题信息，使得项目整理更加便捷。


This versatile plugin is designed for designers and developers to simplify text management and vector graphics processing workflows. By providing a suite of powerful text manipulation features such as one-click extraction, batch replacement, precise filtering, and flexible insertion, it significantly boosts productivity. Additionally, it supports quick export of SVG code and automatic capture of the current window title information, making project organization more convenient.


このプラグインはデザイナーや開発者のためのツールで、テキスト管理とベクターグラフィックス処理を簡素化します。ワンクリックでのテキスト抽出、バッチ置換、特定の条件に基づくテキストフィルタリングなど、強力なテキスト操作機能により、作業効率が大幅に向上します。さらに、SVGコードのエクスポートや現在のウィンドウタイトル情報の自動取得もサポートしています。



功能作用说明


获取文本 / Extract Text


作用：允许用户一键提取设计中的所有文本内容，便于文案管理。


役割：デザイン内のすべてのテキストコンテンツをワンクリックで抽出でき、コピー管理を容易にします。


Function: Allows users to extract all text content in the design with one click, making copy management easier.


替换文本 / Replace Text


作用：支持批量替换文档中的指定文本，快速完成文案更新。


役割：ドキュメント内の指定されたテキストを一括で置換し、コピーの更新を迅速に完了します。


Function: Supports batch replacement of specific text in the document to quickly complete copy updates.


过滤文本 / Filter Text


作用：根据特定条件精准筛选文本，帮助用户聚焦关键内容。


役割：特定の条件に基づいてテキストを正確にフィルタリングし、ユーザーが重要なコンテンツに焦点を当てられるようにします。


Function: Precisely filters text based on specific conditions to help users focus on key content.


插入文本 / Insert Text


作用：允许灵活插入动态文本或占位符，优化设计流程。


役割：動的テキストやプレースホルダーを柔軟に挿入でき、デザインプロセスを最適化します。


Function: Allows flexible insertion of dynamic text or placeholders to optimize the design workflow.


获取 SVG 代码 / Get SVG Code


作用：快速导出矢量图形的SVG代码，便于开发使用。


役割：ベクターグラフィックスのSVGコードを迅速にエクスポートし、開発に利用しやすくします。


Function: Quickly exports SVG code for vector graphics, making it developer-friendly.


获取窗口标题 / Get Window Title


作用：自动捕获当前窗口的标题信息，方便项目整理。


役割：現在のウィンドウのタイトル情報を自動的に取得し、プロジェクト整理を便利にします。


Function: Automatically captures the current window title information, making project organization easier.
plugins.tagline: 乐乎也数字盒子

126908.name: Lehuye
126908.description:
简介：

这款多功能插件专为设计师和开发者设计，旨在简化文本管理和矢量图形处理流程。通过提供一系列强大的文本操作功能，如一键提取、批量替换、精准筛选和灵活插入等，极大地提高了工作效率。此外，它还支持快速导出SVG代码及自动捕获当前窗口标题信息，使得项目整理更加便捷。


This versatile plugin is designed for designers and developers to simplify text management and vector graphics processing workflows. By providing a suite of powerful text manipulation features such as one-click extraction, batch replacement, precise filtering, and flexible insertion, it significantly boosts productivity. Additionally, it supports quick export of SVG code and automatic capture of the current window title information, making project organization more convenient.


このプラグインはデザイナーや開発者のためのツールで、テキスト管理とベクターグラフィックス処理を簡素化します。ワンクリックでのテキスト抽出、バッチ置換、特定の条件に基づくテキストフィルタリングなど、強力なテキスト操作機能により、作業効率が大幅に向上します。さらに、SVGコードのエクスポートや現在のウィンドウタイトル情報の自動取得もサポートしています。



功能作用说明


获取文本 / Extract Text


作用：允许用户一键提取设计中的所有文本内容，便于文案管理。


役割：デザイン内のすべてのテキストコンテンツをワンクリックで抽出でき、コピー管理を容易にします。


Function: Allows users to extract all text content in the design with one click, making copy management easier.


替换文本 / Replace Text


作用：支持批量替换文档中的指定文本，快速完成文案更新。


役割：ドキュメント内の指定されたテキストを一括で置換し、コピーの更新を迅速に完了します。


Function: Supports batch replacement of specific text in the document to quickly complete copy updates.


过滤文本 / Filter Text


作用：根据特定条件精准筛选文本，帮助用户聚焦关键内容。


役割：特定の条件に基づいてテキストを正確にフィルタリングし、ユーザーが重要なコンテンツに焦点を当てられるようにします。


Function: Precisely filters text based on specific conditions to help users focus on key content.


插入文本 / Insert Text


作用：允许灵活插入动态文本或占位符，优化设计流程。


役割：動的テキストやプレースホルダーを柔軟に挿入でき、デザインプロセスを最適化します。


Function: Allows flexible insertion of dynamic text or placeholders to optimize the design workflow.


获取 SVG 代码 / Get SVG Code


作用：快速导出矢量图形的SVG代码，便于开发使用。


役割：ベクターグラフィックスのSVGコードを迅速にエクスポートし、開発に利用しやすくします。


Function: Quickly exports SVG code for vector graphics, making it developer-friendly.


获取窗口标题 / Get Window Title


作用：自动捕获当前窗口的标题信息，方便项目整理。


役割：現在のウィンドウのタイトル情報を自動的に取得し、プロジェクト整理を便利にします。


Function: Automatically captures the current window title information, making project organization easier.

plugins.name: Storyteq CMP Asset Picker
plugins.description:
Introducing Storyteq CMP Asset Picker for Figma: Your shortcut to a faster design workflow.


Why You'll Love It:


Quickly find what you need: Easily search, filter, and sort through your CMP account assets, right from Figma.


All your assets, now available from Figma: See only the assets you're allowed to use, thanks to personalised access based on your CMP account.


Switch domains effortlessly: Switch between multiple domains easily with our domain switcher.


Seamless design flow: Select assets, and they're instantly ready to use in your Figma projects.


Getting started is easy:


Start a trial directly from the plugin and invite your team to join in. Need help or have questions? We're just an email away.


Simplify your Figma design process with Storyteq CMP Asset Picker today.
plugins.tagline: Introducing Storyteq CMP Asset Picker for Figma: Your shortcut to a faster design workflow.

plugins.name: Inked Colibri (RTC Converter and More)
plugins.description:
"Enhance your design workflow with a powerful plugin that converts Realtime Colors into Figma variables. Generate stunning color schemes, manage variables, and ensure contrast compliance with APCA standards. Features include interactive color pairing visualization, CSS variable export, and seamless theme synchronization."

https://youtu.be/H7M28NFhJ14


Core Features


Color Scheme Management

  1. Generate color schemes: monochromatic, analogous, complementary, and more.
  2. Randomize colors with support for multiple schemes.
  3. Enable real-time color updates and synchronization.
  4. Perform APCA contrast calculations and validation.


Matrix Generation

  1. Generate three matrix types: huge, compact, and slim.
  2. Create alpha-based color matrices.
  3. Visualize APCA contrast and validate thresholds.
  4. Customize thresholds and interactively visualize color pairings.


Variable Management

  1. Create and update color variables.
  2. Convert styles bi-directionally.
  3. Export variables as CSS.
  4. Generate and visualize swatches.
  5. Synchronize themes seamlessly.
plugins.tagline: Convert Realtime Colors to Variables, ensure APCA Accessibility, generate schemes, and more!

plugins.name: Optometrist
plugins.description:
1... or 2?

One more time?


When exploring a visual problem space, it’s useful to compare variations 1:1 before moving to the next round of directions.


Optometrist lets you select any batch of frames and instantly compare them in Figma's Preview or Prototype view—or generate a clean, static layout for documentation and presentations.


Simply select frames and:

  1. Compare: Link frames for instant, 1:1 comparisons in the Figma Preview window (Shift + Space).
  2. Advance: Push preferred iterations into a new row for the next round of comparison
  3. Chart: Produce a neat, static overview for evaluation and presentation
  4. Clean: Tidy up frames for comparison


Access quick presets through CMD + P, or Open Optometrist to fine-tune settings.


Get your design prescription and get back to designing.


Feedback Form ->
plugins.tagline: Compare and evaluate iterations
